import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import avatar from '../assets/profile.png' import { Toaster } from 'react-hot-toast' import { useFormik } from 'formik' import { passwordValidate } from '../helpers/validate' import styles from '../styles/Username.module.css'; export default function Password() { const formik = useFormik({ initialValues: { email: 'example@example.com', username: 'example123', password: 'admin123@123' }, validate: passwordValidate, validateOnBlur: false, validateOnChange: false, onSubmit: async values => { console.log(values); } }) return (
